mapper.insert: insert into user (id, email, name, password, gender, birth, job, reg_date, postcode, roadAddress, jibunAddress, detailAddress, extraAddress) values (0, #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{birth},#{job},curdate(), #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress})
mapper.update: update user set readcount = readcount + 1 where id = #{id}
